originalText.text: I definitely wouldn't trust anybody else with my fur baby Kash. They are simply the best ever. They make sure my puppy's health is on top of all his vaccines, health and well-being. Everyone is so lovable sweet helpful and kind to our pets. Team Pure paws always ❤️

text.text: I definitely wouldn't trust anybody else with my fur baby Kash. They are simply the best ever. They make sure my puppy's health is on top of all his vaccines, health and well-being. Everyone is so lovable sweet helpful and kind to our pets. Team Pure paws always ❤️

originalText.text:
Visited Dec 11, 2023
I secured a same day appointment which was already a great start. It’s in a great location, right near Time Square. As soon as I entered, I was greeted very warmly by the front desk clerk, who helped explain everything that would be happening during my appointment. Dr. Liff was super professional, knowledgeable and kind. She broke down every price for me for each service she provided and was very upfront which was greatly appreciated. The price for treating my dog’s ear infection in both ears was very reasonable ($70.54 medication/$40 visit/$86 ear cytology/$47.50 ear cleaning)

Greatly appreciated the $50 new client discount! Will be returning :)

originalText.text: Very professional staff and doctor. My cats were treated with care and Dr. Liff and Dr. Miller were both able to treat my cat and resolve the problem. I definitely will keep this practice for all my future needs.  Extremely fair pricing too and very knowledgeable and courteous staff .  Dr. Liff is a very caring doctor and My cats love her .

text.text: Very professional staff and doctor. My cats were treated with care and Dr. Liff and Dr. Miller were both able to treat my cat and resolve the problem. I definitely will keep this practice for all my future needs.  Extremely fair pricing too and very knowledgeable and courteous staff .  Dr. Liff is a very caring doctor and My cats love her .

originalText.text: One of the best, and my personal go-to Vet in Hells Kitchen, though I'd travel here regardless of my residence in the neighborhood due to how professional, caring, compassionate, and knowledgeable they are. While they may be slightly more expensive than other lower cost Vets in the boroughs, they are still my #1 choice as they explain in detail every charge and what their purpose is/was. I've had two dogs (Pug puppy and a senior Yorkie) examined here multiple times and they've always taken great care. Afterwards the doctors are very friendly and courteous and break down everything perfectly from the exams. I couldn't recommend them enough. The Drs, technicians, assistants, and the entire staff in general are incredible. You won't regret bringing your fur baby in.

originalText.text: I love Purepaws!  First and foremost, the care my dogs receive from Dr. Liff, Dr. McDermott, Dr. Cheung and Dr. Wexler is amazing.  They are caring, readily available for questions and kind and caring.  The rest of the staff is equally lovely.  The practice also runs on time.  I’ve never had to wait for very long for an appointment and we get in and out quickly.  I can’t recommend them enough!
